result.execSummary:
The defendant Brett Joseph Kopp was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $50.00 per month.  2 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brett Joseph Kopp

For review of Bail- Filed by the Defense

Pre-trial conference at 02-04-2016 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 02-26-2016 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Brett Joseph Kopp in court with attorney Anne Cohen.  Defendant Brett Joseph Kopp in custody.  Matthew J Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 4, 2016 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for February 26, 2016 at 08:30 am.
